findOut.title: Find Out
findOut.subtitle: Learn about preventing harassment and how to stay safe
findOut.harassmentDescription: Harassment is any unwanted behavior that makes someone feel uncomfortable, scared, or hurt. It can be physical, verbal, social, or happen online.
findOut.physical: Physical: Hitting, pushing, or touching someone without permission
findOut.verbal: Verbal: Insults, threats, or mean words
findOut.social: Social: Excluding someone, spreading rumors, or ignoring them
findOut.cyber: Cyber: Mean messages, sharing photos without permission, or online bullying
findOut.stayWithFriends: Stay with friends or trusted adults when possible
findOut.tellTrustedAdult: Tell a teacher, parent, or trusted adult if something happens
findOut.notYourFault: Remember: It's never your fault if someone harasses you
findOut.usePlatform: Use this platform to report incidents safely and anonymously
findOut.beKind: Be kind to others and stand up for those who need help
findOut.whatToDoIfYouSeeHarassment: What to Do If You See Harassment
findOut.staySafeDescription: Don't put yourself in danger. Get help from an adult if needed.
findOut.reportItDescription: Use the "Help someone in need" option to report what you saw.
findOut.beSupportiveDescription: Offer kind words and support to the person who was harassed.
